text: Count Zdeněk Filip Maria Emanuel Jiří Ignatius Sternberg (August 15, 1923 - January 19, 2021) was a descendant of the ancient aristocratic Šternberk family and the owner of Český Šternberk Castle and Březina Castle in the Rokycany region. He was the second child and eldest son of the Count George of Sternberg (December 10, 1888 Prague - July 27, 1965 Bruneck) and his wife (married April 6, 1921 Chotělice) Countess Kunigunde of Mensdorff-Pouilly (January 11, 1899 - November 19, 1989). He died on January 19, 2021.Zdeněk Sternberg (1923 - 2021) He was a Medal of Merit recipient.Count Zdeněk Sternberg dies at 97 == References == Category:1923 births Category:2021 deaths
title: Zdeněk Sternberg
